title: The Genius Mind of an Anti-Vaxxer: Truth Unleashed
description: You are invited into this true and compelling story of an American Anti-Vaxxer. She let's you into her extraordinary world of thoughts, lifestyle, daily life, social trends, hope, and vaccine research. This is the first book of its kind. You will get to the last page wanting more, and feeling inspired. An encouraging journey that you don't want to miss out on.
author: Sharon Storm
